mapper.select: select id, code, monthly_rent, apt_name, dorm_max, dorm_current from sdmsdb.sdms_dorm where id = #{id}
select id, code, monthly_rent, apt_name, dorm_max, dorm_current from sdmsdb.sdms_dorm limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into sdmsdb.sdms_dorm(code, monthly_rent, apt_name, dorm_max, dorm_current) values (#{code}, #{monthlyRent}, #{aptName}, #{dormMax}, #{dormCurrent})

insert into sdmsdb.sdms_dorm(code, monthly_rent, apt_name, dorm_max, dorm_current) values
(#{entity.code}, #{entity.monthlyRent}, #{entity.aptName}, #{entity.dormMax}, #{entity.dormCurrent})

insert into sdmsdb.sdms_dorm(code, monthly_rent, apt_name, dorm_max, dorm_current) values
(#{entity.code}, #{entity.monthlyRent}, #{entity.aptName}, #{entity.dormMax}, #{entity.dormCurrent})
on duplicate key update code = values(code) , monthly_rent = values(monthly_rent) , apt_name = values(apt_name) , dorm_max = values(dorm_max) , dorm_current = values(dorm_current)
mapper.update:
update sdmsdb.sdms_dorm
code = #{code},
monthly_rent = #{monthlyRent},
apt_name = #{aptName},
dorm_max = #{dormMax},
dorm_current = #{dormCurrent},
where id = #{id}
